comment: Professor Orlando is a wonderful 3D Modeling professor and goes above and beyond for students. Any interest you have or help you need, he will pull resources and make videos explaining the topics. Great projects with plenty of time to master them, and you learn so much about Z-Brush in his Modeling 2 course and it's integrations with programs.

Professor Orlando treated you like a professional adult. He gave you assignments, gave you information on how to do it, then let you decide whether you wanted to be in class or outside of class. He cared a lot about us and wanted us to succeed, so he would also give us tips and extra information to help us out with projects. 100/10 professor.

I took Professor Orlando his first semester here at Kennesaw, and he was really nice. As long as you followed the requirements for the project, even if it was a simple project that you made, he gave you a good grade.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: The best 3D professor at KSU, sometimes it is difficult to keep up but he takes the time to make sure everyone understands the material before moving on. Gives excellent corrective feedback when you mess up on your assignments. He wants to make sure you understand what you are doing. Overall great teacher!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: He was very supportive of us and helped figure out how we can do assignments from home due to COVID19 and remote schooling. He cares a lot about students and wants to do all he can to help your animation skills grow. He also understands that if you can't be in class, then you can't, so he lets you make adult decisions and have adult consequences.
